overview:
Blake Steck is Managing Partner of Brightbulb Media Partners, a firm specializing in marketing and digital development, primarily for mobile devices.

Prior to founding Brightbulb, Blake oversaw development and execution of acquisition, conversion and pricing strategies for all products for Tokii.com Additionally, Blake is tasked with all external and internal promotion and new product development.

Prior to joining Tokii, Blake managed a collection of digital properties for Internet Broadcasting / Hearst Television and was tasked with developing promotions and digital experiences for popular television shows like “The Office” and “Family Guy”.

Blake also oversaw content operations for GameBattles.com, the world’s largest competitive console gaming platform, from early-stage startup through the property’s acquisition by Major League Gaming in 2006.
